subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Pacers center Roy Hibbert’s impact as a shot blocker is well documented, but he is also averaging 22.8 points and 6.5 offensive rebounds a game against Miami.
snippet: Pacers center Roy Hibbert’s impact as a shot blocker is well documented, but he is also averaging 22.8 points and 6.5 offensive rebounds a game against Miami.
